sub_title: Translator & Liaison interpreter between English, Italian, Russian and Spanish | IT & marketing
summary:
I started travelling before I learnt how to walk. 

My life‚Äôs been always dynamic, a lot of moving from one country to another was involved and, still, I can‚Äôt get enough of it. I understood that being able to connect with people through the same language was the key against hectic and, sometimes, isolated reality.

In the past 15 years, I pursued a professional translator career, pushing myself out of the comfort zone by living abroad to sharpen my language skills and, most importantly, to gain a deepened understanding of other cultures. 

Words are a powerful tool. And I get enthusiastic when it comes to translation, ergo making intercultural communication possible for a variety of domains: my best-loved include IT sphere, AI, face analysis software, DOOH and programmatic Advertising. I'm familiar with the specific language of this field thanks to my working experience in Amsterdam - a world-leading hub in Artificial Intelligence technologies. Business (legal) domain is my other favourite where I excel. A specialisation I grasped during my Master‚Äôs degree studies in Italy. 

With my international experience, from Russia to Italy, from the UK to the Netherlands, I learnt to identify the core message of my client and to transform it into a tailored-to-the-right-audinece translated content.


üåç What languages do I work with?
I translate from Russian, English and Spanish into Italian


üîç Are you looking for a professional translator?
‚ñ™ A bachelor‚Äôs degree holder in translation üéì and 
‚ñ™ completing a master‚Äôs degree in Languages for Communication in International Enterprises and Companies 
‚ñ™ SDL Trados user
‚ñ™ get the job done mindset


üìå What are the areas of specialisation?
‚ñ™ IT (face recognition and face analysis software, programmatic adv)
‚ñ™ business domain
‚ñ™ legal (contracts)
‚ñ™ marketing material (website localisation, blog, newsletter, PR)

Do you need a translation that does not fall under any of these categories? Just ask me and I‚Äôll let you know whether I can help you with a particular project. 


Visit my website www.pitchperfect.studio or contact me on üì© liudmila@pitchperfect.studio
